verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: Hours after a last - minute broadside from President Donald Trump] , [ARG0: Sanford] [V: lost] [ARG1: his primary race] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday night] , [ARGM-ADV: possibly ushering in an end to a political career plagued by a major scandal] .

Hours after a last - minute broadside from President Donald Trump , [ARG0: Sanford] lost his primary race on Tuesday night , [ARGM-ADV: possibly] [V: ushering] in [ARG1: an end to a political career plagued by a major scandal] .

Hours after a last - minute broadside from President Donald Trump , Sanford lost his primary race on Tuesday night , possibly ushering in an end to [ARG1: a political career] [V: plagued] [ARG0: by a major scandal] .
